Class Admin

java.lang.Object
User
Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPasswordUpdate
public class Admin extends User
The `Admin` class extends the `User` class and represents an administrator in the system. Administrators can manage staff, approve or reject replenishment requests, and oversee inventory-related operations.

  • Field Summary

    contactEmail, contactNumber, gender, name, password, role, userID
